subtitle.text: Find answers to the most common questions about our products and services.

footerText.text: Still have questions? Contact our support team for assistance.

answer.text: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging. Returns are free and easy to process through your account dashboard.
Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days, while express shipping takes 1-2 business days. International shipping may take 7-14 business days depending on the destination.
Yes! We provide 24/7 customer support via live chat, email, and phone. Our support team is always ready to help with any questions or concerns.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?

answer.text: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers for larger orders.
